text: Even though a struct is immutable in Julia, it can have mutable fields. So you can do `layer = Dense(10, 5)` then `layer.W .= rand(10, 5)` to update the elements of `layer.W`. What you cannot do is assign the field to point to a different array: `layer.W = rand(10, 5)`.
